title: Authelia Webhook Notification
description: Schema for notification webhooks sent by Authelia for user identity verification events

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference URL for this webhook payload format

recipient.description: Email address of the notification recipient (user receiving the notification)

subject.description: Subject line of the notification message

body.description: Plaintext body content of the notification message, rendered from email templates

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp when the notification was generated and sent

$comment: This schema defines the webhook payload structure for Authelia user notifications. Webhooks are sent for identity verification events including password resets, TOTP registration, WebAuthn registration, and other user-specific communications that would otherwise be sent via email or written to the filesystem notifier.

examples.subject: [Authelia] Password Reset
examples.body: Click here to reset your password: https://authelia.example.com/reset?token=abc123

examples.subject: [Authelia] Register Your Security Key
examples.body:
Follow the link below to register your security key:

https://authelia.example.com/webauthn/register?token=def456

This link expires in 5 minutes.
